text: Francesco Vendramin (1555–1619) was a Roman Catholic cardinal. ==Biography== On 26 May 1608, he was consecrated bishop by Pope Paul V, with Fabio Biondi, Titular Patriarch of Jerusalem, and Metello Bichi, Bishop Emeritus of Sovana, serving as co-consecrators. ==References== Category:1555 births Category:1619 deaths Category:Cardinals (Catholic Church)
title: Francesco Vendramin
